text: Is there a way with Pkg to make sure that all the dependencies of a project are downloaded so that the project can be run later without an internet connection?

elements.text: Is there a way with Pkg to make sure that all the dependencies of a project are downloaded so that the project can be run later without an internet connection?

text: sounds the recommendation is Docker (or Singularity) containers, though there seems to be an approach using Artifacts in <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/offline-installation-of-julia-packages/20083/16>
